snippet: The Federal Communications Commission approved new rules on Thursday that limit the cost of phone calls made from prisons and jails.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Communications Commission approved new rules on Thursday that limit the cost of phone calls made from prisons and jails.

headline.print_headline: F.C.C. Limits Charges For Inmates’ Phone Calls
headline.main: F.C.C. Limits Charges for Inmates’ Phone Calls
